name: MISO
description:
In an unexplored world there is always something to be afraid of. You are in search of a foreign tribe, however it might not be such a simple task. What else is out there? Is there someone behind all of this? Fortunately, music is everywhere and it can lift up your spirit.

– Buldozer

– webik150

– Hromad_a

The game was developed during a 48hour GDS Jam in 2021 by three students of the new game design study programme at FAMU Prague.
